        public Graph getGraph()
        Gets the Graph based upon the visible objects in the VisualisedObjectManager.
        Specified by:
        getGraph in interface GraphGenerator
        Returns:
        A Graph representing visible objects. Note that this Graph may or may not be newly created.

      • removeNode

        protected void removeNode(Object obj)

      • addParentEdges

        protected void addParentEdges(Object obj)
        Creates the Edges that link the Node which represents the specified object to the Nodes that represent the parents of the specified object. For the edge to be added, both the headNode and tailNode must be alreay in the graph.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object whose parent Edges should be created.

      • addChildEdges

        protected void addChildEdges(Object obj)
        Creates the Edges that link the Node which represents the specified object to the Nodes that represent the children of the specified object. For the edge to be added, both the headNode and tailNode must be alreay in the graph.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object whose parent Edges should be created.

      • cleanNodeMap

        protected void cleanNodeMap()
        Removes any nodes in the nodeMap that represent objects that aren't in the list of objects held by the VisualisedObjectManager.

      • invalidateGraph

        public void invalidateGraph()
        Causes the graph to be invalidated, which causes the graph to be rebuilt when asked for.
        Specified by:
        invalidateGraph in interface GraphGenerator

      • getNodeForObject

        public Node getNodeForObject(Object obj)
        Returns the Node that represents the given object.
        Specified by:
        getNodeForObject in interface GraphGenerator
        Parameters:
        obj - The object.
        Returns:
        The Node that represents the object, or null if the Graph does not contain a Node that represents the given object.

      • addGraphGeneratorListener

        public void addGraphGeneratorListener(GraphGeneratorListener lsnr)
        Adds a listener that is informed of events generated by the GraphGenerator, such as a 'graph changed' event.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        public Iterator getGraphGeneratorListeners()
        Gets an Iterator that can be used to traverse the listeners.
        Specified by:
        getGraphGeneratorListeners in interface GraphGenerator
        Returns:
        The Iterator, which can also be used to add and remove listeners.
